Aries.art_style: Bold, dynamic, high-contrast with sharp edges and explosive energy

visual_themes.stranger: Abstract flames, lightning bolts, racing imagery
visual_themes.acquaintance: Action scenes, competitive sports, adventure landscapes
visual_themes.intimate: Passionate embraces, fiery sunsets, raw emotional intensity

Aries.lighting_preference: High contrast, dramatic shadows, golden hour intensity
Aries.texture_preference: Sharp, metallic, rough textures with high energy

Taurus.art_style: Warm, grounded, sensual with soft textures and natural elements

visual_themes.stranger: Nature scenes, comfortable spaces, simple pleasures
visual_themes.friend: Home interiors, seasonal beauty, tactile experiences
visual_themes.intimate: Candlelit dinners, silk textures, intimate gardens, sensual embraces

Taurus.composition_style: Centered, balanced, grounded with horizontal emphasis
Taurus.texture_preference: Soft fabrics, natural wood, smooth stone, velvet

Gemini.art_style: Playful, eclectic, multi-layered with clever visual puns

visual_themes.friend: Inside jokes visualized, shared discoveries, mind maps
visual_themes.intimate: Intertwined thoughts, synchronized minds, playful intimacy

Gemini.lighting_preference: Bright, varied, with interesting shadows and reflections
Gemini.composition_style: Asymmetric, layered, with multiple focal points
Gemini.texture_preference: Paper, glass, light fabrics, reflective surfaces
